jd: From: Sowmyasri, ITECH sowmya.s@itechus.net Reply to: sowmya.s@itechus.net Hi,Greetings from iTech US, Please go through the below requirement and let me know your interest. Position:: Technical Project ManagerLocation:: Sunrise, FL:: Onsite Role ::Duration:: Contract Role Role Description:Seasoned technical project manager proficient in Agile methodologies, with hands-on experience using project management tools such as Jira and Rally to effectively plan, track, and report on project progress.Proven track record in managing complex technical projects from initiation to delivery, ensuring strict adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.Expertise in credit card servicing and fraud systems, ensuring seamless integration of project goals with organizational objectives.Strong problem-solving skills, focusing on risk identification, issue mitigation, and implementing innovative solutions to achieve project milestones and deliverables.Microsoft Enterprise Project Management (EPM) 2007Project Management Please share your updated resume along with current location details: Thanks,Sowmyasri SistlaEmail : sowmya.s@itechus.netiTech US, Inc. https://www.linkedin.com/in/sri-s-8795a9168/
